attributes.action: Dissolve parliament and call an election
attributes.additional_details: Due to breaking their manifesto by getting closer to the EU under the guise of defence  and going against Brexit. The government have broken their election pledge and need to resign.
attributes.background: Dissolve parliament and call a general election

rejection.details:
There is already a petition open on calling a general election, which you may wish to sign:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750050
